channel.title: Rsps 317 [PI] GWD npc clipping problem
channel.description:
Hi again, so every boss works fine except arma, for some reason the boss and its minions attack you before even stepping into the door for the boss. The arma boss and its minions go through the door and just attack you. I tried changing the arma boss and minion's height but they just disappear. Does any one know how to fix this npc clip problem? If so please help!! here is a picture of what I' am talking about:
http://gyazo.com/6c49ec066419604aad98406c24d7e9e4

item.title: Rsps 317 [PI] GWD npc clipping problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Like I said:

sk8rdude461:

And then you need to dump the map data from your client, then make your server read that instead of the data he provided you with.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps 317 [PI] GWD npc clipping problem
item.dc:creator: @arabboi arabboi
item.description:
@arabboi wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:550492”][quote author=arabboi link=topic=669394.msg4476558#msg4476558 date=1426221179]
its every single npc in the whole server. they are not able to move or follow you when you attack them.and im not sure if i did anything wrong i did this processes two times because it happened to me the first time and i thought i did something wrong so i re did it, but i got the same result any idea?
[/quote]
I’d check the code in your NPCHandler, in the process() method.

Make sure that you added the walking checks like he said, and also make sure the Region data is loading on server startup.[/quote]

Okay, you were right I forgot to add walking checks in the process. So everything seems to be working, the player clipping was fixed and npc clipping, but the issue lies with in god wars map. The npcs over there can still glitch through walls. Any ideas on how to fix?

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps 317 [PI] GWD npc clipping problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

arabboi:

its every single npc in the whole server. they are not able to move or follow you when you attack them.and im not sure if i did anything wrong i did this processes two times because it happened to me the first time and i thought i did something wrong so i re did it, but i got the same result any idea?

I’d check the code in your NPCHandler, in the process() method.

Make sure that you added the walking checks like he said, and also make sure the Region data is loading on server startup.

Read full topic

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“arabboi, post:5, topic:550492”]DUDE THANK YOU SO MUCH! Finally

EDIT: after i was done with the tutorial you recommended, all the npc’s were not able to move when i attacked them and they could not follow me if i ran away from them. do you have any idea of what i did wrong or some help? thank you.[/quote]
All NPC’s or the ones in GWD?

It sounds like you might have missed a step or forgot to add a bit of code somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps 317 [PI] GWD npc clipping problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527173.0
You need to add server sided clipping^
And then you need to dump the map data from your client, then make your server read that instead of the data he provided you with.

Read full topic
